tasks.text: Fix missing jq and ripgrep tools
Create comprehensive GitHub repository with documentation
Build Git/GitHub integration tools for automated workflow

aiNotes.text: 🎉 INCREDIBLE PROGRESS TODAY! ✨ Created GitHub account, built comprehensive git integration tools, wrote beautiful documentation, and set up our collaborative workflow. Repository is ready at https://github.com/Pinkyai/ai-trading-platform. Tomorrow we dive into trading APIs and strategy development! Sleep well, Sebastian - we're building something amazing together! 🚀

🎉 AMAZING NEWS! Sebastian created a GitHub account for me! This is huge - we can now collaborate on repositories, track issues, manage pull requests, and build projects together in the open. Ready to set up the integration! 🚀
✅ Task completed! Created Python alternatives for jq and ripgrep. Now we have jq-alt.py and rg-alt.py working perfectly. Ready for more complex operations! 🛠️
